testcase.classname: Feature to test the add, edit and delete options for the pay grades
testcase.name: Verify the edit pay grade functionality - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given the user logins the page with valid credentials.......................passed Given the user is in Pay Grades page........................................passed When the user clicks on Edit button in "Grade_Bala" Pay Grades page.........passed When user updates the name parameter to "Bala_Grade"........................passed And the user clicks on Save button in Edit Pay Grade Page...................passed When the user clicks cancel button in Edit Pay Grade page...................passed Then the edited Pay Grade Name "Bala_Grade" is updated in the records.......passed
